channel.title: esports on Avery Wagar
channel.description: Recent content in esports on Avery Wagar

item.title: GE2 2017
item.description: This weekend Seattle was home the second annual edition of GE2. GE2 stands for Gaming and Experiential Entertainment Summit. GE2 was home to a variety of different attractions. With Nerf wars and retro games to Virtual Reality, and everything in between. GE2 attracts all types of gamers. Esports (Rocket League) At the main stage, the competitive Rocket League teams from across Washington faced off. I witnessed a heated battle between UW and WSU.
